RAD_SUMMARY.TITLE: LBL_CUSTSUMMARY
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_SUMMARY_WHERECLAUSE: CUSTOMER_NO IN (select a.customer_no from sttm_core_customer a where (a.access_group is not null and exists (select 1 from stvw_user_access b where b.user_id = GLOBAL.user_id and b.access_group= a.access_group)) OR a.access_group is null) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'OLSCUSMT') IN ('N','Y')) AND NVL(IS_FORGOTTEN,'N') = 'N'
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_MULTIBRN_WHERECLAUSE: CUSTOMER_NO IN (select a.customer_no from sttm_core_customer a where (a.access_group is not null and exists (select 1 from stvw_user_access b where b.user_id = GLOBAL.user_id and b.access_group= a.access_group)) OR a.access_group is null) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'OLSCUSMT') IN ('N','Y')) AND NVL(IS_FORGOTTEN,'N') = 'N'

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME1,EG_NUMBER,GFCID FROM OLTM_CUSTOMER a WHERE ((a.access_group is not null and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM stvw_user_access b WHERE b.user_id = global.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group)) or a.access_group is null) AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'
SELECT CUST_GROUP FROM OLTM_CUST_GROUP WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND CUST_GROUP_TYPE = 'I' UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL
SELECT CUST_GROUP FROM OLTM_CUST_GROUP WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND CUST_GROUP_TYPE = 'T' UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL

SELECT CLASSIFICATION , CLASSIFICATION_RANKING FROM LMTMS_CLASSIFICATION WHERE BRANCH_CODE = (SELECT BRANCH_CODE FROM LMTM_CLASS_BRANCH WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND BRANCH_CODE = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH)
SELECT SIC_CODE,SIC_CODE_DESC FROM OLTMS_SIC_DEFINITION WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND RECORD_STAT='O'AND BRANCH_CODE =(SELECT LOCAL_BRANCH FROM OLTM_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = ?)
SELECT BIC_CODE,BANK_NAME FROM ISTM_BIC_DIRECTORY WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'
SELECT CUST_GROUP FROM OLTM_CUST_GROUP WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND CUST_GROUP_TYPE = 'H' UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL

select cust_cat, cust_cat_desc from oltms_customer_cat where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O' Union Select cust_cat, cust_cat_desc from STTMS_CUSTOMER_CAT where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'
SELECT MEDIA,DESCRIPTION FROM MSTMS_MEDIA WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'
